delayedNeutrons.description: List of delayed neutrons. Each has an associated decay rate, multiplicity and energy distribution.
delayedNeutrons.name: delayedNeutrons

fissionEnergyReleased.description: Describes how energy released during fission is partitioned between various products.
fissionEnergyReleased.name: fissionEnergyReleased

productYields.description: Container to hold lists of \element{productYield}, including evaluated or processed yields.
productYields.name: productYields

description: Nuclear fission generally produces some prompt neutrons and gammas and occasionally light ions,
plus two large fission fragments. These fragments may then decay and emit additional radiation
including delayed neutrons / gammas, betas, etc. The fissionFragmentData section describes the
heavy (A > 4) fragments and their subsequent decay.
When used for particle-induced fission, this node appears inside the \element{outputChannel}
node of a fission reaction. When used for spontaneous fission, this node appears in the
fissionFragmentData.name: fissionFragmentData

delayedNeutron.description: Information about neutrons emitted at the specified `decay rate' after fission.
delayedNeutron.name: delayedNeutron

delayedNeutrons.description: Stores a list of delayed neutrons, each with an associated decay rate, multiplicity and energy distribution.
delayedNeutrons.name: delayedNeutrons

label.description: Unique label for this delayed neutron group.
label.name: label

rate.description: Decay rate (in decays/second or equivalent) for this delayed neutron group.
rate.name: rate

product.description: Product describing this delayed neutron. Includes average multiplicity and distribution info.
product.name: product

delayedNeutron.description: Stores a delayed neutron product, representing an average multiplicity and distribution for neutrons emitted with the specified decay rate.
delayedNeutron.name: delayedNeutron

double.description: Defines the decay rate. Recommended units are `1/s' or equivalent.
double.name: double

rate.description: Defines the decay rate for the parent \element{delayedNeutron}.
rate.name: rate
